amendment.description: To provide that, of the amount appropriated or otherwise made available by title IV for the Army for research, development, test and evaluation, up to $1,000,000 may be available for the Portable Battery Operated Solid-State Electrochemical Oxygen Generator project.

action.text: Amendment SA 4797 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Voinovich.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4797 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
